ygData.subject: Re: Qeynos
ygData.msgSnippet: are you sure that ANY race and ANY class can wear this armor? if any can could you list exectly what you need to make it and who to get it from.  im a dark elf
ygData.messageBody:
are you sure that ANY race and ANY class can wear this armor?
if any can could you list exectly what you need to make it and who to get it
from. im a dark elf and i think i might send someone on a quest to get one
for me.

Nafertina Level 8 Dark Elf Necromancer [Tunare]
